guides.name: Paige S.
guides.certLevel: Swiftwater Boat Operator, SRT-I & SRT-II NFPA Certified
guides.bio: Hey Y'all, I'm Paige! I have been rafting since I was really little and absolutely love everything about it! I've rafted all over the country and in some pretty crazy rapids.I am sure you will love it as much as I do!

guides.name: Jeremy P.
guides.certLevel: Swiftwater Boat Operator, SRT-I & SRT-II NFPA Certified
guides.bio: Hey, I'm Jeremy - Are you ready to go on an adventure?!? I sure am! I love anything that has to do with rafts, camping, and water. I go through 2-3 pairs of hiking and water sandals a year!

guides.name: Noah L.
guides.certLevel: Swiftwater Boat Operator, SRT-I & SRT-II NFPA Certified
guides.bio: Hi Im Noah, and I love going on adventures! I have been rafting since I was a teenager and became certified to instruct and guide when I was 18. Rafting and being in nature are my passion, and I hope to be able to share that passion with you!
